## Load Package
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(shiny)
```

```{r}
# read csv file extracted
team_clutch_link <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moham6839/Data607_Final_Project/master/Team_Clutch_Data.csv"
team_stat_link <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/moham6839/Data607_Final_Project/master/Team_Stat_Regular_Season_Datat.csv"
nba_teamclutch_dataset <- read_csv(team_clutch_link)
nba_teamstat_dataset <- read_csv(team_stat_link)
```

```{r}
nba_teamstat_summary <- nba_teamstat_dataset %>%
  group_by(TEAM_NAME) %>%
  summarise(total_win = sum(W),
            total_loss = sum(L),
            overall_all_game = sum(GP),
            total_plus_minus = sum(PLUS_MINUS),
            total_fgm = sum(FGM),
            total_fga = sum(FGA),
            total_fg3m = sum(FG3M),
            total_fg3a = sum(FG3A),
            total_ftm = sum(FTM),
            total_fta = sum(FTA),
            total_rebound = sum(REB),
            total_assist = sum(AST),
            total_block = sum(BLK),
            total_steal = sum(STL),
            total_point = sum(PTS),
            overall_winning_pct = total_win/overall_all_game,
            .groups = 'drop')
   
# scatter plot
ggplot(nba_teamstat_summary, aes(x = TEAM_NAME, y = overall_winning_pct)) +
  geom_point(colour = 4) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1, size = 8))
```
